OpenID CX v1 documentation

Providing Request File

Specification | «  Contract Exchange   ::   Contents   ::   Binding(Draft)  »

Providing Request File¶

Request File¶

Request file is JSON formated text file to describe what privacy data Client want to use to provide some services.

Personal Information¶

Reqeust file MUST describe what privacy data the Client want.

Server¶

Mostly, Client doesn’t know which Server holds the End User’s privacy data. If a Client want to use a particular Server’s endpoint, Client may specify “server_id”.

Token¶

Token is a serialization format make by JSON Simple Sing process.
